official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Railroad Safety Act of 1970 and other rail safety acts.
short_title: Federal Railroad Safety Authorization Act of 1982

summary.text: Federal Railroad Safety Authorization Act of 1982 - Amends the Federal Railroad Safety Act of 1970 to authorize appropriations for the purposes of such Act for FY 1983 and 1984. Revises provisions concerning the movement of railroad cars in need of repair. Repeals the Act of May 30, 1908 (commonly referred to as the Ash Pan Act) concerning safety ash pans on locomotives.

titles.title: Federal Railroad Safety Authorization Act of 1982
A bill to amend the Federal Railroad Safety Act of 1970 and other rail safety acts.
